# xploreaop

<!--- This file is autogenerated. Edit xploreaop.json to make changes in this page. --->

A web application for visualization of Adverse Outcome Pathway (AOP) networks and interactive exploration of AOPs for two liver outcomes.

No screenshot available.

<script>
  function initTeSSWidgets() {
    var query = 'xploreaop';
    if (query.trim() != '') {
      TessWidget.Materials(document.getElementById('tess-widget-materials-list'),
                           'SimpleList',
                           {
                             opts: {
                               enableSearch: false
                             },
                             params: {
                               pageSize: 5,
                               q: query
                             }
                           });
      document.getElementById('tess-widget-materials-header').innerHTML = 'Documentation from ELIXIR TeSS'
    }
}
</script>
